name: Eat Bread
description:
Play as a duck, eat some bread and go home. Good times.

WASD to move // Esc to Restart

Things that failed: 

Character animation (exporting)

Sounds (Very choppy)

Starting house textures (barrels, door and  walls) (Didn't work in html5)

Didn't really have any clue what the gameplay would be, but it kinda sorta fits the theme now :)
